ranks.text: Automatically on 4/12.Unlocks Wild Talk ability, allowing for negotiation with Shadows during a Hold Up.Unlocks Arcana Burst, gifting Bonus EXP to Persona of this Arcana based on this Confidant's rank.
Automatically after you infiltrate the first palace.Unlocks Third Eye ability, letting you see things more clearly with L1/L2.
Automatically on 5/5.Unlocks Power Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 8.
Automatically on 6/11.Unlocks Super Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 10.
After the fourth palace.Unlocks High Arcana Burst ability, granting further bonus EXP based on Confidant rank.
Automatically on 8/31.Unlocks the Ultra Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 12.
Automatically on 12/24.Unlocks the Max Arcana Burst, greatly raising bonus EXP for Fool Persona fusion.
